page.title: 11LANGUAGE_ENGLISH TRANSLATION
page.content: {ST.STEPHENS SCHOOL {CORNISH PEOPLE NOW WISH TO BE REALLY {CORNISH, SO MORE ARE LEARNING THE OLD {LANGUAGE. {THIS IS THE HISTORY OF ST.STEPHENS IN {BOTH ENGLISH AND CORNISH, WHICH WE {LEARN IN SCHOOL. } 1811_ST.STEPHENS SCHOOL, THE OLDEST IN SALTASH, FOUNDED UNDER THE CHURCH TOWER. 1843_MOVED TO SITE IN CHURCH ROAD. 1902_BUILDING EXTENDED AND BECAME A NATIONAL SCHOOL. 1940_ST.STEPHENS BECAME A PRIMARY SCHOOL. 1976_LAST ADDITION, HALL AND CANTEEN BUILT. 1984_CONVERSION OF OLD GRAMMAR SCHOOL AT CROSS PARK FOR ST.STEPHENS. 1985_MOVED TO CROSS PARK. 1985_MID-CORNWALL F/E COLLEGE TO EXTEND IN SALTASH,TAKING OVER OLD SITE
